name: Meatfestation (amiya lamisha)
description:
Controls:
WASD - To Move
Left Shift - To Sprint
Left Click - To Throw Flashlight
F - To Turn Flashlight On and Off 

Your Sanity Meter at the top of the screen will deplete over time. When the meter empties, you will go insane and the game will be over... You have a limited number of flashlights to throw at enemies displayed at the top right of the screen. You can hide behind highlighted furniture so enemies temporarily stop chasing you.

Meatfestation is a Proof of Concept game made in 3.5 weeks for the Major Studio Fall course at the NYU Game Center.

The Meat Team:
Kimari Rennis - Project Manager, Lead Programmer, and Audio designer
Amiya Lamisha - Creative Project Manager and Environmental Artist
Nick Fellows - Programmer and Level Designer
Raynah Alleyne - Character Artist and Animator
